accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The Archives of American art does not own the original papers. Use is limited to the microfilm copy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Selected records of the Black Mountain College which pertain to the visual arts program, including minutes and attendent papers; general files; faculty files; and treasurer's files (record groups I, II, III, and VI). Photographs from the general files were microfilmed separately on roll 204.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: Black Mountain College selected records, 1933-1956. Owned and microfilmed by the North Carolina Department of Archives and History, Raleigh, North Carolina for the Smithsonian Institution, Archives of American Art.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reels 185 through 204 available at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals were returned to lender after microfilming.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Black Mountain College Founded in 1933; closed in 1956.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Lent for microfilming 1971 by North Carolina, Department of Archives and History.
